sentences.sContent: I glimpsed a figure at the window.
They caught a glimpse of a dark green car.
sentences.sCn: 他们瞥见一辆深绿色的汽车。

sentences.sContent: ...Saddest of all is when children catch a glimpse of the masked the fire fighter but hide because they think they have seen a monster...

remMethod.val: glim(灯光) ＋ pse → 像灯光一闪 → 瞥见

words.tran: 微弱地发光的；薄弱地发光的

trans.tranOther: to see someone or something for a moment without getting a complete view of them
a quick look at someone or something that does not allow you to see them clearly
